segments.text: Let ’ s call it a day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s nice to go home earlier once in a while . But it ’ s the evening rush .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s hard to commute a long way .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure it is . I really hate to get caught in a traffic jam .
segments.speaker: S2
